function Mental_LV2()
    -- ※以下、③を選択した場合
    -- .女装稽古【精神】LV.2「お花摘みに慣れましょう」

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    -- //BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")

PLAY_BGM("BGM14.wav",0,true)

    -- //BU：アキラ（通常・部屋着）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1363.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "This time, you'll be practicing alone at the academy." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1481.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "A-at the academy? What do you mean?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1364.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "There are unavoidable natural bodily functions in school life, right? I thought you should get used to that." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1482.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Eh...? Natural, bodily functions?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //CI：勃起を暗喩したユルい象さんの絵 085
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_LOAD(55,"CI085a")
LAYER_ALPHA(55,0)
LAYER_POSITION(55,0,-400)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,255,500,Ease.OutSine)
WAIT(1500)

LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_1365.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "To put it bluntly, the restroom." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ha")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1483.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Y-yeah! I understood that, I got it!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ca")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_1366.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Why is your face already bright red? Well, whatever." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_1367.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Anyway, Minachin, you've never once gone to the restroom at the academy, right? You can't exactly go to that multi-purpose restroom every time." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1484.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Yeah... I can hold it, so it's fine." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_1368.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "What if you can't go when it really counts, and you have an accident? Let's train so you can properly go." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1485.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Eh!? Besides being embarrassing, I can't do something perverted like entering the girls' restroom!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03fa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_1369.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Well, considering you're crossdressing to go to a prestigious school, it's too late for that." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_1370.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "I'm not saying you have to use it all the time, just try it once." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1486.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "But since it's practice at the academy, you can't help me either... What if I fail...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_1371.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "It's okay. I prepared a manual so you can do it properly all by yourself.<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])
STOP_BGM(1000)

    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：1-A教室（昼）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG014aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM11.wav",1000,true)

    MSG([[ In the end, I was pushed into agreeing by Akira. ]])

    MSG([[ I'm about to follow the manual Akira gave me during this break and go to the restroom. ]])

    MSG([[ According to Akira's manual, "Follow three points of caution!" but... ]])

    -- //CI：エリカ（真剣）目元切り抜き 039
LAYER_LOAD(210,"BG014aa")
LAYER_SCALE(210,200,200)
LAYER_EFFECT(210, 7)
LAYER_POSITION(210,0,-50)
LAYER_LOAD(211,"BUL_ERI01ba")
LAYER_POSITION(211,0,55)
SET_CUTIN_03_M(200, 500)
WAIT(500)
RESET_CUTIN_03_RIGHT(200, 500)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2644.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (—Now! If I go now, no one will notice I stood up!) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG014ae")
LAYER_SCALE(LAYER_BG,200,200)
LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-2800,-320)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask005" , 500,false)

    MSG([[ I casually stood up from my seat and headed straight toward the classroom door. ]])

    MSG([[ But— ]])

    -- //BU：ヒユ（笑顔）、モブ女子生徒×２
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUL_MOB08aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BUL_HIY01ea")
    --LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
    --LAYER_ALPHA(55,0)
    --LAYER_ALPHA(60,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-800,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-200,0)
    --LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    --LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    --LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0519.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Ah, Sister! We're coming too!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2645.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (I-I've been caught already!?) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ First point of restroom caution: "Girls tend to want to go in groups, so be careful." ]])

    MSG([[ Just as Akira’s manual said, though I never mentioned going to the restroom, they somehow sensed it and tried to follow. ]])

    MSG([[ Now that I think about it, girls often do things in groups. ]])

    MSG([[ Even though they don't actually need to use the restroom, they come along... it's a bit strange. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2646.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (This is not the time to be thinking like this. I-here, I have to act alone somehow!) ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2647.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Sorry everyone, Matsuoka-sensei called me, so I'll go alone." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(60,"BUL_HIY01ga")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0520.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "M-Matsuoka-sensei!? Oh, sorry then..." ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-800,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,400,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,-200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")

    MSG([[ When I mentioned Matsuoka-sensei, the academy’s most passionate teacher, as an excuse to leave the classroom, everyone immediately returned to their seats. ]])

    MSG([[ He’s a good teacher, but many are intimidated by his passionate guidance. ]])

    MSG([[ Especially during breaks, many students don’t want to get caught, so it was very effective. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2648.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (Sorry for using you as an excuse, Matsuoka-sensei... I’ll show up at the tennis club practice again, please forgive me.) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BG：4F廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ad")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ I apologized silently to Matsuoka-sensei as I stepped out into the corridor. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001",1000,false)

    -- //BG：3F廊下
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ac")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)
    -- //BG：2F廊下
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ab")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)
    -- //BG：1F廊下

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Then, to go to a restroom with as few people as possible, I headed down to the first floor. ]])

    MSG([[ And— ]])

    -- //CG：初めての女子トイレ（緊張）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV049aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask006" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2649.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "...I actually entered the girls' restroom." ]])

    MSG([[ I somehow cleared the first stage of training. Now I only have to fully understand the features of the girls' restroom, do my business, and return to class. ]])

    MSG([[ However, right now I'm very vulnerable... Luckily, I didn’t run into anyone, but I’m still nervous. ]])

    MSG([[ I want to finish quickly and return to the classroom. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2650.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "U-um, is this the button Akira said makes noise?" ]])

    -- //SE：トイレの流水音
    PLAY_SE("SEb057.wav")
    WAIT(1000)

    MSG([[ I tried pressing it, and water flowing sounds really started. ]])

    STOP_SE("SEb057.wav")

    MSG([[ This is a device called 'Soundless Hime' that masks the sound of using the restroom with artificial water sounds. ]])

    MSG([[ I had seen it a few times in convenience store restrooms and knew it existed, but apparently, many girls' restrooms these days have them installed. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2651.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (Unlike men, many people here care about the sound they make when using the toilet... I guess.) ]])

    MSG([[ While thinking that, I followed Akira's instructions and used the restroom while the noise played. ]])

    -- //CG：初めての女子トイレ（慣れ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV049ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ ...Yeah. Actually using it, it’s really convenient because no one outside can tell what you did. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2652.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (If I weren’t crossdressing, I probably would never have appreciated this.) ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2653.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (Crossdressing really teaches me many things... At first I hated it, but it’s not all bad.) ]])

SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    -- //SE：トイレの流水音
    PLAY_SE("SEb057.wav")
    WAIT(1000)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2654.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "...So, why am I here alone, getting sentimental in the girls’ restroom...?" ]])

    MSG([[ Even my self-mocking words were perfectly drowned out by the 'Soundless Hime'. ]])

    STOP_SE("SEb057.wav")

    MSG([[ Second point of restroom caution: "Master the use of sound devices." ]])

    MSG([[ But then—an emergency occurred. ]])

    -- //SE：騒ぐ声（ワイワイガヤガヤ）
PLAY_SE("SEf025_2.wav",0,true)

    -- //CG：初めての女子トイレ（緊張）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV049aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2655.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Eh!?" ]])

    MSG([[ Just as noisy voices approached, the speakers entered the restroom. ]])

    MSG([[ Without going into a stall, they continued talking loudly. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0201.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Noisy Student】
 "Ugh, my makeup is all messed up... The school really should have a special room just for fixing makeup." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0202.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Noisy Student】
 "Hey, listen! I heard Yoda-san and Raido-san from Class A are dating!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2656.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (What!? Those two from my class!? I had no idea...) ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0203.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Noisy Student】
 "So lucky... I want a girlfriend too! A cute, handsome girlfriend!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0204.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Noisy Student】
 "Class C doesn’t have any 'princess'-level girls, seriously disappointing. I want Erika Onee-sama to step on me every day." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0205.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Noisy Student】
 "It’s famous in Class A to get stepped on daily. Ah... being stepped on by those beautiful feet, I’d totally lose my heart." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2657.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (I’ve never stepped on anyone!? Where did that rumor even come from...?) ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0206.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Noisy Student】
 "This is just a rumor, but Lira-sama from Class B is actually manly. That’s why she looks like she has no chest." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0207.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Noisy Student】
 "Ehh~~~? That can't be true~~~? There’s no way there are boys at this academy." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0208.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Noisy Student】
 "If Lira-sama really was a guy, I’d confess right away, haha." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2658.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (Sorry... there is a boy. Right beside you all.) ]])

    MSG([[ The scandalous topics kept coming, so I couldn’t help but mentally retort. ]])

    MSG([[ The last point in Akira’s restroom caution: "Be careful of gossip sessions in the restroom." ]])

    MSG([[ The girls outside showed no sign of ending their chatter, and I really didn’t want to come out while they were talking about me. ]])

    MSG([[ Also, it’s kind of embarrassing to be found inside a stall, so I held my breath without even wearing panties. ]])

    -- //SE：騒ぐ声（ワイワイガヤガヤ）
PLAY_SE("SEf025.wav")

    MSG([[ Holding my breath. ]])

    -- //SE：騒ぐ声（ワイワイガヤガヤ）
PLAY_SE("SEf025_3.wav")

    MSG([[ Holding it continuously. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2659.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (P-please finish soon... Why do people talk so long in the restroom...?) ]])

    MSG([[ Thus, my first experience in a girls’ restroom ended with bitter memories and a deep scar. ]])

    -- 　　　　◆

    -- Mental パラメーター更新
    SaveData.TrainingParam.Mental = 2

    -- 3	オトメ＊ベッドイン	『精神』レベルを１以上にした
    UNLOCK_TROPHY(3)
    -- 6	花摘む乙女に祝福を	『精神』レベルを２以上にした
    UNLOCK_TROPHY(6)
    if SaveData.TrainingParam.Visual >= 2 and SaveData.TrainingParam.Intelligence >= 2 and SaveData.TrainingParam.Mental >= 2 then
        -- 7	ドンストップ！エリカくん	すべてのステータスのレベルを２以上にした
        UNLOCK_TROPHY(7)
    end


STOP_ALL_SE(1000)
STOP_BGM(1000)
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    TrainingStatusUp("Mental" , 2)

    ScenarioManager.TrainingNext()
end
